column5: Well thanks to the Habbs....LOL I decided to go to a bar and watch the Penns lose game 6, so i leave my wallet and cell phone in the truck and guess what.....Some lowlife scum breaks into my truck and steals my wallet and cell phone....Now if anybody has or knows of a blackberry 8300 0r 8310 on the bell network for sale i'd be willing to buy it, as now i have to replace my work phone.

not only can I sell you one..it has your phone number..   not really, sorry to hear about it ..shoot them all let god sort it out  you can check these ones out    http://www.factorydirect.ca/catalog/category_list.php?cat=7110
don't replace the berry and live a much happer and relaxed life.  how did people ever get by before...
Call Bell's customer service line up and see if they can do anything for you. You might be eligible for a hardware upgrade.

Seeing as your in the GTA I would recommend NOT getting a new one through bell/rogers, they screw you when your under contract and need a new phone, tried to charge me $200 for a basic phone. There's tons of little electronics stores especially downtown that have phones that they unlock and set up for you for cheap I'm sure you can find the balckberry you want for a lot less than bell, I got my Palm Treo for $50 and they connected it for free at a little store on danforth.  -Ben

I bought an unlocked GSM phone from this place once.  It was "grey" market at best.  When powered-up, it showed the Sprint logo.  It also died within a few months.  and only comes with a 90 guarantee. Just make sure you're OK with that.
Factory direct has some cheap ones
Ebay is your best bet, get one from here or states with a clean ESN. Alternatively Kijiji is full of those.
